intro: Nissolia, commonly known as the silverleaf nissolia, is a flowering plant native to parts of Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its glossy, dark green leaves and clusters of small, white flowers. It thrives in tropical and subtropical climates, preferring well-drained soil and partial shade. Nissolia is often cultivated for its ornamental value and is also used in traditional medicine.
